alert.note: Alert for Floyd; Johnson; Magoffin (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Johnson, northwestern Floyd and east central Magoffin Counties through 815 PM EDT... At 744 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Skaggs, or near Salyersville, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Marshallville around 750 PM EDT. Gypsy and Ivyton around 755 PM EDT. Gapville, Riceville and Fredville around 800 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Brainard, Swamp Branch, Dobson, Bonanza, Dotson and Blue River. THIS INCLUDES Bert T. Combs Mountain Parkway between mile markers 75 and 76. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
